paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses transthyretin (TTR) amyloidosis and mentions various sequence variants of the TTR gene, including their clinical significance and penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The hereditary form of ATTR has 120 sequence variants of transthyretin.

variants.additional_notes: The paper mentions that both wild type and mutant forms of transthyretin can result in extracellular accumulation of amyloid fibrils.
key_quotes: The hereditary form of ATTR has 120 sequence variants of transthyretin.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant was mentioned in the context of the TTR gene without specific cDNA or protein notations.
